definitions.definition: A person ’s own handwriting , especially the signature of a famous or admired person.
examples: Some autograph -hunters were pestering the players after the game.

definitions.definition: A person's signature used as a mark of formal approval.
examples: If you could just put your autograph on the ol’ contract, please…

definitions.definition: A manuscript in the author ’s handwriting.

main_definition: A person ’s own handwriting , especially the signature of a famous or admired person.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , colloquial ) A person's signature used as a mark of formal approval.
A manuscript in the author ’s handwriting.
